contact: J.H. King, N. Papitashvili @ ADNET, NASA GSFC

parameters.name: Rot1800
parameters.description: Bartels Rotation Number (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: IMF1800
parameters.description: OMNI ID code for the source spacecraft for time-shifted IMF values (see OMNI documentation link for codes) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PLS1800
parameters.description: OMNI ID code for the source spacecraft for time-shifted IP plasma values (see OMNI documentation link for codes) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: IMF_PTS1800
parameters.description: # fine time scale IMF points (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PLS_PTS1800
parameters.description: # fine time scale plasma points (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: ABS_B1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Average B Field Magnitude, nT, (last currently-available OMNI B-field data Jun 12, 2025) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: F1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Magnitude of average field vector (nT) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: THETA_AV1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Latitude/Theta of average B vector (deg) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PHI_AV1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Longitude/Phi of average B vector (deg) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: BX_GSE1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Bx (nT), GSE (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: BY_GSE1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP By (nT), GSE (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: BZ_GSE1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Bz (nT), GSE (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: BY_GSM1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP By (nT), GSM (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: BZ_GSM1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Bz (nT), GSM (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-ABS_B1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation of average B magnitude (nT) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-B1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation of magnitude of the average vector field (nT) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-Bx1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation Bx (nT), GSE (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-By1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation By (nT), GSE (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-Bz1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation Bz (nT), GSE (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: T1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Plasma Temperature, deg K, (last currently-available OMNI plasma data Jun 22, 2025) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: N1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Ion number density (per cc) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: V1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP plasma flow speed (km/s) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PHI-V1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP plasma flow direction longitude (deg),  phi (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: THETA-V1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP plasma flow direction latitude (deg), theta (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: Ratio1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Alpha/proton ratio (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: Pressure1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Flow pressure (nPa) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-T1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation of plasma temperature (deg k) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-N1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation of ion number density (per cc) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-V1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation in plasma flow velocity (km/s) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-PHI-V1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation in plasma flow  direction longitude (deg), phi (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-THETA-V1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation in plasma flow direction latitude (deg), theta (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: SIGMA-ratio1800
parameters.description: RMS deviation alpha/proton ratio (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: E1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Electric Field (mV/m) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: Beta1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Plasma beta (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: Mach_num1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Alfven mach number (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: Mgs_mach_num1800
parameters.description: 1AU IP Magnetosonic mach number (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PR-FLX_11800
parameters.description: 1AU Proton flux > 1 MeV, 1/(SQcm-ster-s), (last currently-available OMNI proton fluxes Mar 04, 2020) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PR-FLX_21800
parameters.description: 1AU Proton flux >2 MeV (1/(SQcm-ster-s)) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PR-FLX_41800
parameters.description: 1AU Proton flux >4 MeV (1/(SQcm-ster-s)) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PR-FLX_101800
parameters.description: 1AU Proton flux >10 MeV (1/(SQcm-ster-s)) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PR-FLX_301800
parameters.description: 1AU Proton flux >30 MeV (1/(SQcm-ster-s)) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PR-FLX_601800
parameters.description: 1AU Proton flux >60 MeV (1/(SQcm-ster-s)) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: MFLX1800
parameters.description: Magnetospheric Contamination of 1AU Proton Flux code (6=No,<=5 see OMNI documentation) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: R1800
parameters.description: Daily sunspot number V2, from  http://sidc.oma.be/silso/datafiles/ (1963/001-2025/151) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: F10_INDEX1800
parameters.description: F10.7 - Daily 10.7 cm solar radio flux, units: 10**(-22) Joules/second/square-meter/Hertz, from NGDC (1963/001-2025/176), (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: KP1800
parameters.description: Kp - 3-hour Kp*10 (Kp=1-,1,1+ corresponds to 7,10,13), fromNGDC (1963/001-2025/176) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: DST1800
parameters.description: Dst - 1-hour Dst index (1963/001-2014/366), Provisional Dst (2021/001-2024/304), Quick-look Dst (2024/305-2025/176), from WDC Kyoto (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: AE1800
parameters.description: AE - 1-hour AE-index,from WDC Kyoto (1963/001-1988/182), Provisional (1990/001-2019/365), from WDC Kyoto (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: AP_INDEX1800
parameters.description: ap - 3-hour ap-index (1963/001-2025/176), from NGDC (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: AL_INDEX1800
parameters.description: AL - 1-hour AL-index, from WDC Kyoto (1963/001-1988/182), Provisional (1990/001-2018/059), from WDC Kyoto (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: AU_INDEX1800
parameters.description: AU - 1-hour AU-index,from WDC Kyoto (1963/001-1988/182), Provisional (1990/001-2018/059), from WDC Kyoto (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: PC_N_INDEX1800
parameters.description: PC - 1-hour Polar Cap index (North, Thule station), from NGDC (Final 1975/001-2023/365) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: Solar_Lyman_alpha1800
parameters.description: Solar Lyman-alpha (1963/001-2025/175) (half-hour midpoint)

parameters.name: Proton_QI1800
parameters.description: Solar wind (magnetic energy density)/(kinetic energy density) (half-hour midpoint)
